about_the_game:
Cursed Town: Undead Nightmare allow you to freely explore the game map and investigate multiplayer locations, the aim is to be able to survive.


Demo Features.

-Control a character and learn about his past story.
-Discover the game map by exploring all locations with dangerous enemies.
-Enjoy the unique Mythos horror graphics with improved effects.
detailed_description:
Cursed Town: Undead Nightmare allow you to freely explore the game map and investigate multiplayer locations, the aim is to be able to survive.


Demo Features.

-Control a character and learn about his past story.
-Discover the game map by exploring all locations with dangerous enemies.
-Enjoy the unique Mythos horror graphics with improved effects.
name: Cursed Town Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP (SP3) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Merom) 1.66GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 950 or equivalent
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Penryn) 2.53 GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 4500MHD or equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Survive the night in this old abandoned town.
